name: Evil Cogs
description:
Dark fairy-tale about little beam of light.
Explore the strange and mystic world.Essence and features of the gameIn the game you will play the role of a small creature, consisting entirely of light. You are the last light beam of hope in dying world covered with darkness. Genre: Action Adventure in gloomy black and white stylistics. Player’s task is to get to the end of the level alive. One of the main features of the game is a huge emphasis on physics. Everything from exploring of location to solution of puzzles is based on physics of surrounding world.IntroYour fantasies come true!
Explore that strange, fantastic, mystic world.
Soak up the atmosphere of the dark fairy-tale.
Little light beam needs your help.
So become a light - fight with darkness.
Your way will be hard, but don't be afraid of anything.
Till your light shines - you can make it!
